alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teller, southwestern El Paso and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Security around 250 PM MDT. Security-Widefield around 255 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
